name: Blixo
headline: B2B BNPL for SEA
description: Blixo offers fast, scalable, and more accessible short-term (3 months) supply chain financing in Southeast Asia (SEA). Blixo specializes in providing smaller loans (<$50k) with an AI-driven underwriting process (approval in <1 week). These loans have higher repayment rates and lower per customer risk. Blixo uses AI credit scoring based on real-time data such as cash flow and inventory, further reducing risk and streamlining repayment. Unlike traditional banks and recent FinTech entrants, Blixo can profitably finance the 74% of suppliers and retailers in SEA that otherwise would be overlooked by traditional lenders because they either lack a traditional credit score or need a loan under $100k.

founders.name: Danilo Stern-Sapad, Founder
founders.description: Launched several multimillion dollar businesses—one made hundreds of millions in revenue, one made millions in the first year alone and grew to tens of millions in revenue after two years, and another was acquired in less than one year. Was also part of the founding team of the most popular legal website on the Internet and created one of the most played online games in the world while still in high school, garnering over 40 million visitors per month.

## Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL)
Grant your customers the ease of installment payments while safeguarding your financial stability with immediate, full payments from Blixo. Customers might resort to traditional credit options or forego purchases due to lack of immediate funds. Blixo allows your customers to enjoy their purchases immediately with a pay-later option while you receive upfront payments, removing your financial risk. 
  * Offer Financial Flexibility
  * Ensure Immediate Payments
  * Zero Financial Risk
  * Boost Customer Loyalty

## Subscription Billing
Manage your recurring billing through one platform, predict churn, optimize retention, improve acceptance rates, automatically update expired or replaced credit cards. No matter what type of business our robust subscription management platform can support many unique business requirements including revenue recognition schedules, metered billing, add-ons, coupons, etc.
  * Revenue recognition
  * Churn prediction
  * Fully customizable
  * Subscription analytics

[Get paid regularly](https://blixo.com/<./pricing>)
![Automated Collections](https://blixo.com/img/automated-collections.fbc5c440.png)
## Automated Collections
Send emails, text messages (SMS), phone calls, and letters to remind your customers to pay. Automate these collections, chasing, and dunning activities or set reminders for your collectors to follow up on delinquent or past due accounts. Empower your collectors with intelligent tools that prevent delinquencies, increase transparency and help collectors maintain best practices.
  * Automated reminders
  * Custom dunning
  * Task management
  * Aging reports

[Get paid on time](https://blixo.com/<./pricing>)
![Cash Application](https://blixo.com/img/cash-application.1836c2e5.png)
## Cash Application
Our intelligent matching engine delivers market-leading match rates at the envelope and item level from multiple sources so you can automatically match payments and balances to invoices quickly and painlessly with very high accuracy. We provide an approval workflow for you and as you manually edit things our system grows smarter through the use of machine learning and will better match your information in the future.
  * Intelligent matching
  * Approval workflow
  * Bank integrations
  * ERP integrations

[Match payments faster](https://blixo.com/<./pricing>)
![Invoice-to-Cash](https://blixo.com/img/invoice-to-cash.bafe6f28.png)
## Invoice-to-Cash
Automatically generate and send invoices based on pre-populated items (products & services) and customer information, track when they are opened and get paid faster by automatically billing your customers using their preferred saved payment method. Set up recurring invoices to auto-send and auto-charge with scores of payment methods supported.
  * Recurring invoices
  * Reusable items
  * Invoice view tracking
  * Auto-bill customers

[Get paid faster](https://blixo.com/<./pricing>)

## Customer Portal
Bill your customers through your own brandable customer portal where they can view and pay all outstanding invoices with one payment, manage their preferred payment methods, update their contact information, view and download invoices, view and download statements, view and download payment history receipts, manage subscription plans, etc.
  * Batch pay all invoices
  * View payment history
  * Download statements
  * Updated payment info

[Get paid faster](https://blixo.com/<./pricing>)

### Blixo: The Future of B2B Financing in Southeast Asia

**Overview**  
Blixo is a fintech startup founded in 2020 and is part of the Y Combinator Batch S21. With a team of two and based in Miami, Florida, Blixo is revolutionizing the way businesses in Southeast Asia (SEA) access short-term financing through its innovative Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) model.

**Mission**  
The mission at Blixo is clear: to provide accessible B2B BNPL solutions tailored for the unique landscape of SEA. The platform addresses a significant gap in the market by offering smaller loans (under $50k) that are often overlooked by traditional banks.

**Key Aspects of Blixo's Offering**  
- **Fast and Scalable Financing**: Blixo's loan approval process leverages artificial intelligence for underwriting, ensuring decisions are made in less than a week. Their model not only allows for quick access to funds but does so with a focus on lower customer risk and higher repayment rates.
  
- **AI-Driven Credit Scoring**: By utilizing real-time data such as cash flow and inventory levels, Blixo minimizes risk. This approach is particularly beneficial for the 74% of suppliers and retailers in SEA who either lack formal credit scores or require loans less than $100k.

- **Comprehensive Solutions**: Blixo's platform goes beyond financing. It also automates accounts receivable, collections, billing, and cash applications, ensuring businesses can manage their cash flow efficiently. Key features include:
  - BNPL solutions for flexible customer payments
  - Subscription billing
  - Automated collections for delinquent accounts
  - A customizable customer portal
  
**Customer Feedback**  
Blixo’s users have lauded its simplicity and effectiveness:
- Users appreciate the intuitive setup, allowing for streamlined management of subscriptions and payments.
- The platform is particularly advantageous for service-based businesses, aiding in the seamless collection of payments.
  
**Industry Position**  
Blixo is strategically positioned as a solution for various industries, including SaaS, E-commerce, and professional services. Its integrations with popular accounting software like QuickBooks and Xero further enhance its value proposition.

**Looking Forward**  
As it continues to evolve, Blixo is poised to play a significant role in democratizing financing for businesses in Southeast Asia, making essential capital accessible to those who need it most, without the burdensome requirements of traditional lenders.

For more insights and to explore how Blixo can benefit your business, visit their [website](https://blixo.com).
